title: How Sharon Van Etten came undone on her new album
description: How lockdown anxiety inspired the folk-rock star's most devastating album to date.

description: A selection of the best photos from across Africa this week.

title: Sri Lanka's energy crisis hits country's fishing industry

description: The Kenyan villagers were on alert after some of their livestock had recently gone missing.

title: Warning UK economy to shrink as interest rates rise
description: Rates rise to 1% from 0.75%, their highest level since 2009, in a bid to tackle soaring inflation.
